The objective of this game is to chop the gems. The cells you click can have a gem or a number.
The pickaxe\'s function is to reveal a cell where you think there is a gem. Also, avoid using dynamite to break a gem.
Each number represents the number of adjacent gems on the board.
The pickaxe has a set number of uses. This is represented in the bottom bar. So if it empties, you lose the game.

In each game you will have three lives: if you make a mistake and a gem is broken three times, you lose. There is also a chance that you will lose the match due to time, this can be seen through a counter in the top center.
To choose your preferred difficulty mode you will have to click on the difficulty option in the main menu and then hit Play.
Keep in mind that if you choose the hard or very hard difficulty mode you will have to swipe up as the grid is higher than your mobile screen.
Good luck in your new game!
